CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Date_Time_Reopened__c), IF( ISBLANK(ClosedDate), ROUND((NOW() - CreatedDate), 2), ROUND((ClosedDate - CreatedDate), 2) ), IF( ISBLANK(ClosedDate), ROUND((NOW() - Date_Time_Reopened__c), 2), ROUND((ClosedDate - Date_Time_Reopened__c), 2) ) )
CustomField.label: Case Duration Since Open/Reopen (Days)
